Articles.Content:
I was landing a craft from the Mun and it ended up going through the ground and landing at 0ft sea level.  I did exit the game several times during the mission after switching off to another ship or to the KSC/VAB while the original craft in orbit.

https://imgur.com/a/ZBbmYgg
Had the same issue with a craft landed on Mun. Randomly, when I was switching to it, it fell under the ground. Even sometimes when I was just loading the save. But it's random
